title: So many problems did I just get a bad one?!? Volume, Screen Flickering and won't update :( Help!
content:
I have 3 big issues 

Will not download the November security patch am really hopeful that will fix the other 2 problems. 

On a black screen it flickers not horribly but noticeable. 

The random volume is the worst though 
Sometimes I play a video and the volume is louder than I could ever turn it up to and the volume does not respond. 

Also a third is speech to text stops working in android auto until I reboot phone then it works again for maybe 10 minutes or so. 

The support system on the phone has been no Help at all 

I have factory reset the phone and tried to leave it without restoring the apps and data will not update still.

Please help me I really want to love pixel phones the 2xl was amazing the 3xl was. Pretty good the 4 was a complete mess. If I can't figure out these issues I am going to try a different brand phone any suggestions would be welcome for that also.
